testCase.name: Search Controller tests GET /movies/search?title --> search movie by title
Search Controller tests GET /movies/search?title --> 404 if not found
Search Controller tests GET /search?year --> search movie by year
Search Controller tests GET /search?year --> 404 if not found
Search Controller tests GET /search?genre --> search movie by genre
Search Controller tests GET /search?genre --> 404 if not found
Search Controller tests GET /search? --> 400 not found search criteria
Reviews Controller tests POST /movies/:movieid/reviews --> create new review
Reviews Controller tests POST /movies/:movieid/reviews --> 400 invalid request body
Reviews Controller tests GET /movies/:movieid/reviews/:reviewid --> get review by id
Reviews Controller tests GET /movies/:movieid/reviews/:reviewid --> 404 not found
Reviews Controller tests PUT /movies/:movieid/reviews/:reviewid --> 400 invalid request body
Reviews Controller tests DEL /movies/:movieid/reviews/:reviewid --> delete review
Movies Controller tests GET /movies --> list all movies
Movies Controller tests POST /movies --> create new movie
Movies Controller tests GET /movies/:movieid --> get movie by id
Movies Controller tests POST /movies --> 400 invalid request body
Movies Controller tests GET /movies/:movieid --> 404 if not found
Movies Controller tests PUT /movies/:movieid --> 400 invalid request body
Movies Controller tests DEL /movies/:movieid --> delete a movie not found error
Users Controller tests GET /user --> get data from current logged user
Users Controller tests POST /user --> register new user
Users Controller tests POST /user --> 400 if missing fields
Users Controller tests POST /user --> 400 if user duplicated
Users Controller tests POST /user/login --> 403 if wrong creddentials
Users Controller tests POST /user/login --> 200 login user
Movies API should hit homepage
